## KeyboardAdaptorDiscreteEvent interface

Event: Fired when a key in a `discrete` KeyboardAdaptor's mapping is released (`onKeyUp`<!-- -->)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface KeyboardAdaptorDiscreteEvent extends DiscreteEvent 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [DiscreteEvent](./controls.discreteevent.md)

## Example


```javascript
adaptor.on('trigger', () => {
  // do something
})

```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [trigger](./controls.keyboardadaptordiscreteevent.trigger.md) | string | KeyMapping key that triggered the event |
